content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Where Am I? Normal damage. The target is stunned 2. Bludgeoning
Surprise Opening You gain 1 action that you can use before the end of your turn to use an attack action against the target. Piercing
Missing Ear Normal damage. The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception check and Charisma-based check except Intimidation until healed. Slashing
Mind Cloud The target is stupefied 2 until healed. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #2
